dmca.title: DMCA Notification ISP a2zoutletstores.com/Universal Remote
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 10, 2006 8:39 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: DMCA Notification ISP a2zoutletstores.com/Universal Remote
Subject: DMCA Notification ISP a2zoutletstores.com/Universal Remote



                                                                                                                         

10/12/2006

7006 0810 0000 2689 7112

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

Everyones Internet

Chris Newcomb

390 Benmar Dr Suite 200

Houston TX 77060

 

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

Dear Designated Agent:

This office is authorized to act on behalf of Universal Remote in this matter.

This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
